title: लक्ष्मी मित्तल द्वारा भारतीय राजनीती पर टिप्पणी बताकर झूठी ऑडियो क्लिप व्हाट्सप्प पर वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: An audio file is circulating online claiming to be remarks on Indian politics and religion by our Chairman and CEO. We do not know who the speaker is, but it is not Mr Lakshmi Mittal.
